Room.Name: Secret Passage
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a small secret passage with a locked door to the south.
Room.LongDescription: The passage heads north back into the frost giant caverns. The door to the south is protected by what appears to be a bone lock, one of the most secure devices and nearly impossible to pick. Through the keyhole, you can see at least six skeletons and a couple of skeletal warriors chanting loudly. There is also a key in the center of the room.
